title: Dear Enemy
overview: Luo Man and Chen Kai Xi were college classmates. After graduation, the two gradually drifted apart. One became a successful screenwriter, and the other became a rich housewife. Real and fake best friends of ten years meet again; they don't want the other person to have a bad life, nor do they want the other person to have a good life. Luo Man is not satisfied with her career and hopes to achieve a leap in life through marriage and become equal to Chen Kai Xi, who is deeply stuck in the quagmire of marriage. When the undercurrent between the two was raging, the young and beautiful Zhong Qing Cheng became a key figure in the contest between the two.
